resources.string: Restrict Topic
Only channel ops can edit the topic.
Block Colors
Messages containing color codes are blocked, as if the user was muted.
Strip Colors
All messages are stripped from color and control codes.
Invite Only
Only invited users can join the channel.
SSL only
Only users connected via SSL can join the channel.
Unlisted
The channel will not be listed anywhere.
Block Unidentified
Blocks unidentified users from joining the channel.
Paranoid
Disables the KNOCK command and the channel will not be shown in whois replies. Additionally, the channel won’t show up in listings.
Registered
The channel is registered with channel services.
Moderated
Blocks users without voice from talking.
Block External
Blocks users not in the channel from sending messages to it.
Flood Protection
Prevents users from flooding the channel with messages.
Password Protection
Users will have to enter a password to join the channel.
Channel Limit
Sets a maximum limit for users in the channel.
Reduced Moderation
Messages normally muted are still visible to ops.
Block Notices
Prevent notices from being sent to the channel.
Disable Invites
Prevents users from inviting others into the channel.
Auditorium Mode
Users can only see ops and themselves.
Quit Unidentified
Prevent unidentified users from sending messages.
Block Kicks
Prevents users from being kicked from the channel.
Permanent Channel
The channel is not deleted, even when all users leave.
IRC Operators Only
Allows only IRC Operators to join the channel.
IRC Help Staff Only
Allows only IRC Help Staff to join the channel.
Block Nick Changes
Prevents users from changing their nick while being in the channel.
Limit Joins
Sets a limit for how many users may join the channel per specified timespan.
Allow Invite
Anyone can invite users to this channel.
Block Forwarding
Prevent other channels from forwarding to this channel.
Allow Forward
Anyone can forward to this channel.
Block Action
Prevents users from using /me in the channel.
Block Caps
Prevents users from sending all-caps messages.
Block Knock
Prevents users from using /KNOCK to request an invite.
Enable Badwords Filter
Uses the network censor to block messages containing blocked words.
Hide Joins
Users are hidden until they speak.
Block Repeat Messages
Prevents users from sending the same message repeatedly.
Block Autorejoin
Prevents users from automatically joining after they have been kicked.
Secure Channel
All users in the channel are joined via SSL.
Block CTCP
Block CTCP messages from the channel.
Admin Only
Allow only IRC admins to join the channel.
Forward
Forward users who can’t join the channel to another channel.
